info.name: YouTube "Hitchhiker" 2014 Dark [CENTERED] RELOADED
info.description: Youtube "Hitchhiker" - A dark youtube style created to ease your night-sessions on youtube! :) features: -centered videos and contents -a nice and dark user interface -comfortable improvements, such as the top-fixed searchbar Also check out these dark themes :) Facebook "HitchHiker" Userstyles "HitchHiker" Youtube "HitchHiker" ZippyShare "HitchHiker" Greasy Fork "HitchHiker" Wikipedia Fork "HitchHiker" FEEL FREE TO SEND IDEAS, SUGGESTIONS AND QUESTIONS TO -> hitchhikerstyle@gmail.com Please comment and give feedback if you like this Style :) it would help me a lot in terms of motivation. Thanks!
info.additionalInfo:
OLD CHANGELOG: http://pastebin.com/raw.php?i=eFRGcniF

- 17.02.2014 - Rewrote the code completely from scratch! made it a lot thinner :)
but still:
*need to make the video-upload page dark
*need to implement support for a non-fixed topbar
*need to work on a couple of details
- until then, have a lot of fun with it and please keep on reporting in those bugs! THANKS! :) -

- 21.02.2014 - YOUTUBE YOU MAKE ME SICK!
repaired most of the damage that the new youtube layout has brought! 
also added the dropdown option for a non-sticky topbar :)

- 25.04.2014 - Small fixes, TokHaar helped again! :) props!
*white underlayed text has been fixed
*a couple of buttons and borders have been changed to the style-standards
*the playlist preview-list has been covered in chocolat - nah not really but it looks nice now

- 14.11.2014 - @Hrtz: Thanks again for the small fixes you provided! Did some media query magic to kill the player-size bugs, included a sprite file and filled in some more color - sorry for the very big wait, IM NOT DEAD YET, ADMONG! >:(

data.title: the best theme for youtube, but now it needs an update!
WHERE ARE 2015 ONE, I NEED IT

options.label: Brighter

h4,
h5,
